channel.title: Game freezes when loading - save possibly corrupted?
channel.description: So, I was playing Black Mesa, and it froze while loading during the chapter Surface Tension. But now, whenever I try to load a game from the main menu, it never finishes! I've tried this with multiple saves, and it keeps happening. What could've caused this?

item.title: Game freezes when loading - save possibly corrupted?
item.dc:creator: BobTheHeadcrap
item.description:
So, I was playing Black Mesa, and it froze while loading during the chapter Surface Tension. But now, whenever I try to load a game from the main menu, it never finishes! I’ve tried this with multiple saves, and it keeps happening. What could’ve caused this?

Read full topic
item.source: Game freezes when loading - save possibly corrupted?
